summary: A documentary on the history, mystery, and meaning of the ubiquitous Jewish standard that follows the around-the-world journey of the song from Ukraine to Youtube. of the song "Hava Nagila."
cast: Harry Belafonte|Glen Campbell|Connie Francis|The Klezmatics|Danny Maseng|Leonard Nimoy|Rusty Schwimmer|Regina Spektor
title: Hava Nagila: The Movie
